<!-- source-hash: f53790b887edccab7e43e64d3605bba8 -->
A response DTO that wraps a list of organizations with pagination metadata for external REST API endpoints.

## Key Components

- **`organizations`** - List of `OrganizationResponse` objects containing the actual organization data
- **`total`** - Integer representing the total number of organizations available (for pagination)
- **Lombok annotations** - `@Data`, `@Builder`, `@NoArgsConstructor`, `@AllArgsConstructor` for automatic code generation

## Usage Example

```java
// Building a response with organizations list
OrganizationsResponse response = OrganizationsResponse.builder()
    .organizations(Arrays.asList(
        OrganizationResponse.builder()
            .id(1L)
            .name("Acme Corp")
            .build(),
        OrganizationResponse.builder()
            .id(2L)
            .name("Tech Solutions")
            .build()
    ))
    .total(25)
    .build();

// Accessing the data
List<OrganizationResponse> orgs = response.getOrganizations();
Integer totalCount = response.getTotal();
```

This DTO is typically used by REST controllers to return paginated organization lists, where the `total` field helps clients implement proper pagination controls while the `organizations` list contains the current page of results.
